channel.title: Diconnect when buying items
channel.description: Hey, I have a problem where if you select the "buy 10 of item" option when your buying an item from a shop, it disconnects you, and you log back in with about 50 of the item. Im using 317 evolution x source. Please help, Gpot

item.title: Diconnect when buying items
item.dc:creator: @killercam killercam
item.description:
@killercam wrote:

Hey, I have a problem where if you select the “buy 10 of item” option when your buying an item from a shop, it disconnects you, and you log back in with about 50 of the item. Im using 317 evolution x source. Please help,
Gpot
